add_ons_language.__about_elanat: elanat-framework is a powerful base for portal or content management system use, theme-able (Separate Styles and Templates),multi content (post, page, video ...) , eight varios add-ons support (component, module, plugin, page, patch, fetch, extra helper, editor template) multi language add-ons (c, c++, and all interpreted languages support), lightweight CMS, multi language support, High Security , built with the dot net framework and C# programming in inner mvc structer. According to regular designations, Elanat is the best option for development.
add_ons_language.dot_net_version_is_not_support_new_updat: dot net version is not support new update
